spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-ps
spec_data.Description:
When this plugin is installed it adds the yum command "ps", which allows you
to see which running processes are accociated with which packages (and if they
need rebooting, or have updates, etc.)
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:02:52 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Yum plugin to look at processes, with respect to packages
